com.tumblr.permissme.utils

Class PermissMeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tumblr.permissme.utils.PermissMeUtils

  • public final class PermissMeUtils
extends Object
    Utils to help in common runtime permission related tasks introduced in AndroidM
    See Also:
    Runtime Permissions Ref Doc} Created by sumbul on 1/28/16.

    • Method Detail

      • verifyPermissions

        public static boolean verifyPermissions(@NonNull
                        int[] grantResults)
        Check that all given permissions have been granted by verifying that each entry in the given array is of the value PermissionChecker.PERMISSION_GRANTED.
        Parameters:
        grantResults - the results to check whether they are granted
        Returns:
        whether the permissions have been granted
        See Also:
        Activity.onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[])

      • getDeniedPermissions

        @NonNull
public static String[] getDeniedPermissions(@NonNull
                                    Context context,
                                    @Nullable
                                    String... permissions)
        Given a list of permissions, get all the permissions that are denied by the user.
        Parameters:
        context - Caller context
        permissions - List of permissions to check
        Returns:
        The denied permission, if there is one, else empty array

      • needToRequestPermission

        public static boolean needToRequestPermission(@NonNull
                              Context context,
                              @NonNull
                              String... permissions)
        Check if we already have access granted for this permission
        Parameters:
        context - The caller activity
        permissions - The permissions that needs to be granted
        Returns:
        Whether we have access to the permission

      • showPermissionDeniedSnackbar

        public static void showPermissionDeniedSnackbar(@NonNull
                                Activity activity,
                                @Nullable
                                String customErrorMessage)
        Shows the snackbar which is used in the scenario where user auto-denied permissions before. It can also be used to display the permissions snackbar if user is trying to interact with a feature which requires permissions the user hasn't granted
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity with the view to attach the snackbar to
        customErrorMessage - an optional custom error message. this method uses the default one if the custom one is null

      • hasCameraPermission

        public static boolean hasCameraPermission(Context context)
        Common camera permission check.
        Parameters:
        context - caller context
        Returns:
        whether the package has camera permissions granted

      • hasReadWriteStoragePermission

        public static boolean hasReadWriteStoragePermission(Context context)
        Common READ/WRITE Storage Permission Check.
        Parameters:
        context - caller context
        Returns:
        whether the package has read+write storage permissions granted

      • isAutoDeniedPermission

        public static boolean isAutoDeniedPermission(AppCompatActivity activity,
                             @NonNull
                             String permission)
        Checks if the permission is auto-denied, i.e. the user tapped "Never ask again" in the dialog before, thus, the permission cannot be queried for
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity
        permission - the permission being queried
        Returns:
        whether the permission was auto-denied by the system for the package

      • createSettingsClickListener

        public static View.OnClickListener createSettingsClickListener(Activity activity)
        The onClickListener that takes you to the app's system settings screen
        Parameters:
        activity - the caller activity used to start the settings intent
        Returns:
        the View.OnClickListener

      • showSnackBar

        public static void showSnackBar(View view,
                String msg,
                int backgroundColor,
                String ctaString,
                View.OnClickListener ctaClickListener)
        Displays a SnackBar message.
        Parameters:
        view - the view to find a parent from.
        msg - the message to display.
        backgroundColor - the background color.
        ctaString - the call to action string
        ctaClickListener - the call to action click listener.

      • runOnUiThread

        public static void runOnUiThread(Runnable runnable)
        Helper method to post a Runnable to the main thread
        Parameters:
        runnable - runnable to execute on the main thread
